long_description: Sure to become your summer staple, the Columbia Willowdale(TM) pants are built for comfort with soft cotton, simple style and high-quality construction. 100% cotton canvas is naturally soft, breathable and durable. Integrated UPF 50 sun protection continuously guards against harmful ultraviolet rays. Relaxed fit sits just below the waist and features loose, straight legs. Closeout.
short_description: Sure to become your summer staple, the Columbia Willowdale(TM) pants are built for comfort with soft cotton, simple style and high-quality construction.
